column3: 2015 madeline n. mc. donaldmudge(nee zanella)age 90 years
column6: 2015 at symphony of joliet. born in lozzo di cadore
column8: 2015. she resided in joliet most of her life. she was employed as a bookkeeper for several joliet area businesses and lastly for kaluzny bros. of rockdale. preceded in death by her parents
column9: felix and justina (nee frescura) zanella and three brothers
column11: aldo zanella and albert filippi. survived by her daughter
column14: alette mc. donald; numerous nieces and nephews also survive. visitation for madeline mudge mc. donald will be held at st. paul the apostle catholic church on friday morning
column17: followed by a mass of christian burial beginning at 10:00 am. interment st. patricks catholic cemetery. upcoming events. visitationjun 12. 9:00 am - 10:00 am st. paul the apostle catholic church18 woodlawn ave. joliet
